hadiths.text: Narrated Zayd ibn Khalid al-Juhani: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) distributed sacrificial animals among his Companions. He gave me a kid (of less than a year). I took it to him and said: This is a kid. He said: Sacrifice it. so I sacrificed it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَجُوزُ مِنَ السِّنِّ فِي الضَّحَايَا
chapter.eng-name: What Is Allowed Regarding Age For The Udhiyyah (Sacrifice)
